code: import*as actions from'../../reduxState/actions';export function setStyle(e,unit){var id="wrapper:".concat(document.getElementById('id').value);if(document.getElementById(id)===null){alert('please click on the HTML element to style it !!');return;}var styleProp=e;var styleValue=document.getElementById(e).value;var payload={id:id,styleProp:styleProp,styleValue:styleValue,unit:unit};actions.updateStyling(payload);}
